title: Baron Emote
body: Hello, how do I use the Baron emote in a game? I have the icon equipped.

replies.body: You can do the Baron Emote by hitting Ctrl+6 in-game with that icon equipped ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=t1Ey9xEE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-23T20:26:09.953+0000)
>
> You can do the Baron Emote by hitting Ctrl+6 in-game with that icon equipped ^_^!

Thanks for replying--

I tried that, but I only get my normal mastery level emote

Weeeeiiiiiird.....the Baron emote should replace the mastery emote while the event is active. I can see that you still have the right icon equipped so it should be showing up instead of the mastery one. 

I did notice also that one of the Arcade bundles ended a bit early and left the store today. I'm thinking the emote might have accidentally been disabled too early, but I'll have to reach out to a few people to know for sure.

While we're here, if you could be so kind, my emotes aren't working properly. The Baron emote shows up for me, still, but I can't change it with the emote wheel in the options menu. I'm not sure why, but whatever key I bind does nothing.
